snippet: A D.J.’s remarks about Nicki Minaj’s hit “Starships” led Ms. Minaj to back out of her scheduled appearance at Hot 97 Summer Jam 2012 on Sunday.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performances at the Hot 97 Summer Jam in East Rutherford, NJ; Nicki Minaj cancels her set at the last minute after DJ Peter Rosenberg makes disparaging remarks about her music.
lead_paragraph: A D.J.’s remarks about Nicki Minaj’s hit “Starships” led Ms. Minaj to back out of her scheduled appearance at Hot 97 Summer Jam 2012 on Sunday.

headline.seo: Nicki Minaj Backs Out of Summer Jam
headline.main: Nicki Minaj Skips Festival After a D.J.’s Remarks
headline.print_headline: Nicki Minaj Skips Festival After a D.J.’s Remarks
